anss

Class DiffOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • anss.DiffOutput

  • public class DiffOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods for converting a Diff to different output formats. It also has utility methods and constants useful for other classes that provide an output format for a Diff, such as DiffView.

    • Method Detail

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(anss.Diff diff,
                             java.io.Writer writer)
        Print a textual representation of diff out to writer. The entire diff is written, without regard for the start and end times. One hunk is printed on each line. The format for a line is "tag start\tduration", where '\t' represents a tab character.
        Parameters:
        diff - the Diff to write
        writer - where to write the diff to

      • writeEPS

        public static void writeEPS(anss.Diff diff,
                            java.io.Writer writer)
        Write a graphical representation of diff out to writer in EPS format. The output will be clipped to diff's start and end times.
        Parameters:
        diff - the Diff to write
        writer - where to write the diff to

      • getDateGranularity

        public static int getDateGranularity(anss.Diff diff)
        Return a date scale granularity that is appropriate for the date range represented by diff.
        Parameters:
        diff - the Diff for which to calculate the granularity.
        Returns:
        one of Calendar's field values: Calendar.MILLISECOND, Calendar.SECOND, Calendar.MINUTE, Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, Calendar.DATE, or Calendar.MONTH. Return -1 if either of diff.start or diff.end is null.
